      • setOriginalBoard

        public Cell[][] setOriginalBoard(java.lang.String filePath)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Setting original board at the beginning of the game according to the set-up
        Parameters:
        filePath - String of file path of the level file
        Returns:
        Cell[][] return 2D Array of the original board with original set up from config
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - throw if file is not found
